meanings: (속담) Sadness and gladness succeed each other. or Joy and sorrow are next door neighbours. or Bad luck often brings good luck. or The worse luck now, the better another time.

phrases.phrase: 저는 재미있는 프로그램이 방송 될 때만 봅니다.
meanings: TV I only watch TV when there is an interesting program.
until black hair becomes the root of a spring onion, till death do them part
(때·시기 등에 이르다) be, come, become, (나이가) reach, (formal) attain, (경과하다) pass
